text_block_list.text: The day of the festival. Matikanetannhauser was participating in a racing game tournament with friends. It's a team battle with a driver and two supporters.

text_block_list.name: Ikuno Dictus
text_block_list.text: Turbo-san! Once we clear the grassland course, use the acceleration item!

text_block_list.name: Ikuno Dictus
text_block_list.text: Tannhauser-san, please rev the engine by button-mashing in sync with the acceleration.

text_block_list.name: Matikanetannhauser
text_block_list.text: O-okay! Button-mashing, right! Fnunununuuuuuuuuuuu!!

text_block_list.name: Ikuno Dictus
text_block_list.text: No, don't mash until after we clear the grassland! There's a gimmick where grass gets tangled in the tires—

text_block_list.name: Twin Turbo
text_block_list.text: Whoa, whoa, whoa!?

text_block_list.name: Matikanetannhauser
text_block_list.text: Wah!! Sorry, Turbo...!

text_block_list.name: Twin Turbo
text_block_list.text: No problem!! I recovered! Ikuno, I need the item—!!

text_block_list.name: Twin Turbo
text_block_list.text: Wahahahaha!! It's Turbo's win—!!

text_block_list.name: Matikanetannhauser
text_block_list.text: (Ah, I messed up~. I'm just a burden like this~...)
Next is the semifinals. The opponents are a trio considered contenders for the championship. It was the powerhouse BNW team!

text_block_list.name: Biwa Hayahide
text_block_list.text: I saw your performance up to now. Let's have a good match, shall we!

text_block_list.name: Ikuno Dictus
text_block_list.text: Turbo-san. Stay on the inside of the course. We'll overtake at the next curve.

text_block_list.name: Twin Turbo
text_block_list.text: Leave it to me! Here I go—!!

text_block_list.name: Narita Taishin
text_block_list.text: —Hayahide.

text_block_list.name: Biwa Hayahide
text_block_list.text: Yeah. I won't let them pass. Take this, banana missile!

text_block_list.name: Twin Turbo
text_block_list.text: Ngyah!? I slipped—!!

text_block_list.name: Ikuno Dictus
text_block_list.text: We've entered the city stage. There are many obstacles, so please slow down.

text_block_list.name: Narita Taishin
text_block_list.text: —Ticket.

text_block_list.name: Winning Ticket
text_block_list.text: Oookay! Show 'em your driving skills! Leave this to me! Full throttle—!!

text_block_list.name: Twin Turbo
text_block_list.text: Ikuno! We're falling further and further behind!? Wh-what should we do!?

text_block_list.name: Ikuno Dictus
text_block_list.text: If we close the distance during the curve's deceleration, we won't need to use items—

text_block_list.name: Ikuno Dictus
text_block_list.text: No. All that's left is this straightaway...! Deceleration is out of the question...

text_block_list.name: Ikuno Dictus
text_block_list.text: Tch, the opponent is accelerating even more... We need to think of another plan quickly...!

text_block_list.name: Matikanetannhauser
text_block_list.text: Umm... uhhh...!

text_block_list.name: Matikanetannhauser
text_block_list.text: (I have to do something... something too...! Something—)

text_block_list.name: Matikanetannhauser
text_block_list.text: (Huh!? This course... it's the course I researched yesterday...!)

text_block_list.name: Matikanetannhauser
text_block_list.text: Then...!!

text_block_list.name: Matikanetannhauser
text_block_list.text: Both of you, the race is far from over yet~!!

text_block_list.name: Matikanetannhauser
text_block_list.text: Hnnnngh~!!

text_block_list.name: Ikuno Dictus
text_block_list.text: !? Our items were replenished!? What in the world—

text_block_list.name: Matikanetannhauser
text_block_list.text: It's a secret trick using motion sensors! With this move, you can get items!

text_block_list.name: Matikanetannhauser
text_block_list.text: Leave the button mashing to me! Hnnnnghhhh~~~!!

text_block_list.name: Ikuno Dictus
text_block_list.text: Turbo-san! I'll use the acceleration item. I'm leaving the driving to you...!

text_block_list.name: Twin Turbo
text_block_list.text: Alright! Full turbo ahead, aaaaaah!!

text_block_list.name: Matikanetannhauser
text_block_list.text: We're side by side!! Just a little more~~! I won't give up, aaaaaah~~!!

text_block_list.name: The Three
text_block_list.text: Daaaaaah---!! Daaaaaah---!! Haaaaaah---!!
After a close battle, they splendidly overtook the BNW team, and Matikanetannhauser and the others won the semifinal match!

text_block_list.name: Matikanetannhauser
text_block_list.text: We did it~! It's all thanks to you two~~!!

text_block_list.name: Twin Turbo
text_block_list.text: Well, yeah! But it's also thanks to Machitan's secret trick!

text_block_list.name: Ikuno Dictus
text_block_list.text:
Yes. Tannhauser-san's power is considerable.
She even researched secret techniques that Taishin-san didn't know...
It was impressive.

text_block_list.name: Matikanetannhauser
text_block_list.text:
Ah, hehe. It's not that much...
I'm getting all embarrassed~!
choice_data_list: Let's aim for first place at this rate!
Let's aim for first place at this rate

text_block_list.name: Matikanetannhauser
text_block_list.text:
Ah, hehe. It's not that much...
I'm getting all embarrassed~!
choice_data_list: Let's aim for first place at this rate!
Let's aim for first place at this rate

text_block_list.name: Matikanetannhauser
text_block_list.text: Well~, that's about all I'm good for~!

text_block_list.name: Matikanetannhauser
text_block_list.text:
Anyway, I'll do my best next time with that guts~!
Please keep cheering for me.

After that, they lost the final to Tokai Teio and the others,
but they had somewhat satisfied expressions.

text_block_list.name: Matikanetannhauser
text_block_list.text:
Yes! I've got the hang of it too,
so next time should go even smoother!

text_block_list.name: Matikanetannhauser
text_block_list.text:
No matter who comes,
they won't be a match for the three of us~!
So declared Matikanetannhauser and the others...

In the final, they faced Tokai Teio's team,
and before her genius skill,
they unfortunately lost.
